text: My community has a strong network of organizations and individuals that work together to provide opportunities for people to get essential math and literacy skills.
My community actively invests and works to provide opportunities to get essential math and literacy skills to its members.
I am aware and understand about the importance of all people receiving education basics of math and language (reading, writing, speaking).
I am aware and understand the accessibility to different opportunities to learn and resources available for that (libraries, education centres, and similar).
I am aware of the basics of math and language (reading, writing, speaking)?
I am empowered to keep on learning and improving your knowledge consistently.
I am empowered to read books on a regular basis.
I am empowered to help people in my community to get more access to education opportunities.
I feel confident using basic math and language principles and skills in practice
How much interest do you take in your and your communities education?
On a scale from 1 to 10 how likely are you to recommend participating in this project for a friend?
